features.subject: 🎁 Congratulations! You’ve Won a $500 Amazon Gift Card

headers.Subject: 🎁 Congratulations! You’ve Won a $500 Amazon Gift Card

features.body:
Hello,

You\u2019ve been selected to receive a $500 Amazon Gift Card. This offer is available for a limited time only.

To claim your reward, please click the link below:  
https://bit.ly/3FreeReward

Act now before the offer expires!

Sincerely,  
Amazon Promotions Team

email_content:
From: Amazon Rewards <promo@amazon-prizes.club>
Reply-To: claim@amazonfreegift.co
Return-Path: winner@amazon-prizes.club
